thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com | 12 of 1307
thread.title: Ed
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Ed

author: Ed
title: Ed
text: I ordered my tires online from the Town Fair Tire website (great website, easy to use), I received e-mail confirmation of my order, and voicemails to let me know tires had arrived. I had set up my appointment online(convenient!), and was provided with a ride to work, after dropping off my vehicle. I was sent text messages to tell me that the work was completed, and my truck was ready and waiting for me when I arrived to pick it up. Overall, about as pleasant a tire-buying experience as anyone could possibly hope for.
